description.title: Create Grade 2 Science Activity Icons Set
description.summary: Design and produce 15 custom activity icons for Grade 2 Science curriculum covering physical science, life science, and earth science topics
description.details:
Grade 2 Science curriculum requires custom activity icons that align with NSA visual standards and support young learners' comprehension.
Required icons by category:
Physical Science (5 icons): - Matter and materials exploration - Simple machines demonstration - Forces and motion activities - Sound and vibration experiments - Light and shadow investigations
Life Science (5 icons): - Plant growth observation - Animal habitat research - Life cycle documentation - Food chain exploration - Ecosystem investigation
Earth Science (5 icons): - Weather pattern tracking - Rock and mineral examination - Water cycle demonstration - Seasonal changes observation - Earth and space exploration
All icons must be SVG format, 175px width, accessible color contrast, and include descriptive alt text.
description.acceptance_criteria: - 15 unique SVG icons at 175px width standard - Consistent visual style matching NSA brand guidelines - WCAG AA color contrast compliance (4.5:1 minimum) - Age-appropriate imagery for Grade 2 students (6-7 years) - Clear visual metaphors that support learning objectives - Proper file naming following NSA conventions - Integration with icon-map.json system

requirements.deliverable: 15 SVG icon files with consistent styling
Alt text specifications for each icon
R2 bucket upload and path validation
